name: Deanna Rae STONE, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner

judges: Justice FITZGERALD did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: Deanna Rae STONE, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Alowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED and the Order of the Commonwealth Court is REVERSED. See McGrory v. Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing, 591 Pa. 56, 915 A.2d 1155 (2007).
Justice FITZGERALD did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
919 A.2d 194
Deanna Rae STONE, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 10, 2007.
